thread.title: Zuckerberg, back on Capitol Hill for Day Two of testimony

title: Zuckerberg, back on Capitol Hill for Day Two of testimony
text:
Zuckerberg, back on Capitol Hill for Day Two of testimony 4:53pm EDT - 01:40 
Facebook's CEO Mark Zuckerberg started a second day of testimony on Capitol Hill on Wednesday, facing more questions from lawmakers about data privacy at the world's largest social media network. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   
Facebook's CEO Mark Zuckerberg started a second day of testimony on Capitol Hill on Wednesday, facing more questions from lawmakers about data privacy at the world's largest social media network. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2INQKtL
